mapper.select: SELECT c.club_no FROM club c INNER JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT c.CLUB_NO, c.CLUB_NAME, c.CLUB_EXPLAIN, zc.SIGUNGU, zc.SIDO, ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NAME, mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NAME, mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO, a.attach_no FROM Club c JOIN ZIP_CODE zc ON c.ZIP_CODE_NO =zc.ZIP_CODE_NO JOIN Minor_CATEGORY mi ON c.CLUB_CATEGORY = mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO JOIN MAJOR_CATEGORY ma ON mi.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO = ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO left outer join club_image ci on c.club_no = ci.club_no left outer join attach a on ci.attach_no = a.attach_no WHERE c.ZIP_CODE_NO IN(SELECT zip_code_no FROM ZIP_CODE WHERE SIdo in (SELECT z.sido FROM MEMBER m JOIN ZIP_CODE z ON m.MEMBER_ADDR = z.ZIP_CODE_NO WHERE m.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}) ) and ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NAME in( SELECT ma.major_category_name FROM MAJOR_CATEGORY ma JOIN MINOR_CATEGORY mi ON ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO =mi.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO WHERE mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT mc.like_category FROM MEMBER_CATEGORY mc JOIN MEMBER m ON mc.member_id = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.member_id=#{memberId}) )

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( SELECT c.CLUB_NO, c.CLUB_NAME, c.CLUB_EXPLAIN, zc.SIGUNGU, zc.SIDO, ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NAME, mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NAME, mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO, a.attach_no, sysdate-c.club_date+1 as plus_day FROM Club c JOIN ZIP_CODE zc ON c.ZIP_CODE_NO =zc.ZIP_CODE_NO JOIN Minor_CATEGORY mi ON c.CLUB_CATEGORY = mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO JOIN MAJOR_CATEGORY ma ON mi.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO = ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO left outer join club_image ci on c.club_no = ci.club_no left outer join attach a on ci.attach_no = a.attach_no WHERE ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NAME in( SELECT ma.major_category_name FROM MAJOR_CATEGORY ma JOIN MINOR_CATEGORY mi ON ma.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO =mi.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO WHERE mi.MINOR_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT mc.like_category FROM MEMBER_CATEGORY mc JOIN MEMBER m ON mc.member_id = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.member_id=#{whereString}) ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.ZIP_CODE_NO IN ( SELECT zip_code_no FROM ZIP_CODE WHERE SIdo IN ( SELECT z.sido FROM MEMBER m JOIN ZIP_CODE z ON m.MEMBER_ADDR = z.ZIP_CODE_NO WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{whereString} ) ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) TMP ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{finishRow}
